body:
Comment 1 by **jimteeuwen**: 
In addition, a compiler error is thrown when the source does not have a trailing
newline. (eg: prog.go:7: missing newline at end of file).

If this is a artifact of the go parser, it would probably be a good idea to
automatically add a newline when the user hits the submit button, or have the code go
through gofmt first.

This sandbox tool is the PR beachhead for potential new Go users. You don't want to
present them with silly stuff like that.
